data.text: @enews Noone should ever forget his/her roots.
@enews Maybe simpler, but not better. You will know this when you get older.

@enews If anyone could please find it in their hearts to either retweet or donate we would be really grateful 
We need your help to fight this nasty cancer so I can live to watch my sons grow
Thank you from the bottom of my heart ❤️ 
https://t.co/FZ0WibW1A5
